TopicTitle: Kerbal Mechwarrior Program (All aboard the hype dropship!)

Articles.Content:
Yes.... now all we need is for FASA and RoboTech to say that Kerbals look too similar to their IP and we now are going to have to fight it out using Mechwarrior 2's NetMech.

\*Edit: And I still have the old disks XD

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-19T08:12:01Z" title="04/19/2015 08:12  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 19, 2015</time> by Fel**
I still have my mercs CD here somewhere...
